1.content:
You sighed. It had been a long tedious day and it was only half over. You had sat alone in the lunch hall because none of your coworkers cared for you much. You hated your life right now. You had been the most popular employee at the men's jail. You had even had some inmates who had been ruthless show some kindness after seeing them enough. But the city had transferred you to the women's prison because of your success and hoped you could improve this run down jail that was all but run by the inmates inside. Of course it hadn't worked and it appeared you would be staying here for a long while.
You stood up and tossed the tray into the sink. From there, you walked outside to monitor the inmates. You heard your name called and went to investigate. You were called down a narrow dark alley. You looked at the walls, staring at the dimly lit graffiti when a beam of yellow light shot out at you. It hit you before you could run and you instantly blacked out.
---
You awoke a few minutes later. You were in a cell, but it didn't seem normal. It was...bigger? Your theory was confirmed as you realized you couldn't have been more than 2 inches tall. You panicked, until realizing that there was someone else in the room, someone normal sized. You gazed in awe at the eyes of...

As you gaze upon the giant woman, who now seemed even larger in comparison, you decided it would be best to head between the bars. Keeping an eye on the prisoner, you began taking steps backwards towards the door, hoping beyond hope to make it past the bars. After your third step though, you watched her head turn sharply towards you, and her eyes were open. At once you spin around, and dash madly towards the door. Behind you, there is a loud thud as she steps out of the bed, and another as she took long strides towards you, covering a distance that would have taken you fifteen minutes to run in just two steps. You see her bare foot come down in front of you, and her short, rounded toes wiggled a bit. you turn to try and run in the opposite direction, only to smack right into the side of her other foot.

"You didn't think I would go through all the trouble of shrinking you down, just to let you get away in my sleep, did you?" She tapped you with her big toe, and knocked you onto your back. As you looked up, you could see the giant Chinese prisoner standing above you. "It took a lot of work getting my rebels to smuggle this in here, and I wanted to test it to make sure it worked." She carefully placed her big toe on you, pinning you down. "Now, the question is, do I keep you for myself, or sell you to the highest bidder here in return for favors~?" Even though she was being very careful. you were still hurting from the massive weight put on your body, and it was difficult to breath. You are a guard at the local woman's jail. You were transferred to the women's jail because of an excess of guards at the men's jail. You quickly became hated by all the other prisoners and guard, and one day, one of them had their revenge.

You--Was 5"11, Black hair, White, 28, fairly strong build.

Annie Smith--5"9, Red head, White, 25, slightly muscular. In for armed robbery.
